name: Ghee Pongal
description: Serves 1 | A savory dish made of cooked rice and green gram blended with clarified butter,mildly tempered with spices, garnished with cashews and servedhot

name: Onion Dosai
description: Serves 1 | An appetizing dosa made out of rice and lentil batter with a sprinkling of finely chopped onions,coriander, and chilies served with sambar and chutneys

name: Poori Masala
description: Serves 1 | A delicious Indian breakfast dish comprising of 2 big circular fluffy deep fried wheat flour Pooris served with a mildly spiced vegetable korma and coconut chutney
